content: As a Canadian student who never had to go through the SATs, I have much preferred interviews/applications/etc. that are focused on building your portfolio, network because they show how well-rounded a candidate is (including their technical skill set). The topic of efficiency is interesting… I think there can be ways to process candidates efficiently while looking at valuable skills (some examples I listed in questions I enjoyed doing). It will definitely take a lot to overhaul the existing process though :/
